data.name: Stories school
data.detailed_description:
Meet a very strange school that can not only teach you, but also entertain and scare you! Meet students and also teachers who are "Glad to see you".

The game is a 2D quest where you will move between locations performing one or another action. Interact with the characters around you by fulfilling their requests. Also in the game there are various mini-games that will dispel the gameplay.

Envy yourself new friends, make fun of your enemies, or just have a peaceful lesson!

Customize your student by dressing them up in different outfits and head to school on the bus!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
